snippet: India will play Sri Lanka in a one-day international in Cuttack in eastern India on Sunday, a day when it should have been engaged in a five-day test match against the West Indies.
lead_paragraph: India will play Sri Lanka in a one-day international in Cuttack in eastern India on Sunday, a day when it should have been engaged in a five-day test match against the West Indies.

headline.main: Cricket Contract Dispute in India Forces Schedule Change
